owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

paused().details: Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise.

params.amount: Amount of stake on the registered token to remove
params.hash: Hash identifying the item to loose stake, for instance IPFS Base58 Hash

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

params.token: The address of the authorised token contract

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

devdoc.title: Contract for copyright authorship registration through creations manifestations

addEvidence(string).notice: Adds an evidence if there is already a manifestation for `hash`.

addEvidenceProvider(address).notice: Adds an evidence provider `provider` contract that can then call addEvidence(...) to add evidence.

addStake(uint256,string).notice: Adds `amount` stake on the registered token to the item with `hash`.

getEvidenceCount(string).notice: Get the evidence count for the manifestation with `hash`.

getManifestation(string).notice: Retrieve the title and authors of the manifestation with content hash `hash`.

isStakable(string).notice: Checks if a manifestation for `hash` exists and thus can get stake.

isStaked(string).notice: Check if the stakable `hash` has some stake.

isUnevidenced(string).notice: Check if the evidencable `hash` has no evidence yet.

manifestAuthorship(string,string).notice: Register single authorship for `msg.sender` of the manifestation with title `title` and hash `hash`. Requires hash not previously registered or expired.

manifestJointAuthorship(string,string,ad.notice: Register joint authorship for `msg.sender` plus additional authors `additionalAuthors` of the manifestation with title `title` and hash `hash`. Requires hash not previously registered or expired and at most 64 authors, including the one registering.

removeStake(uint256,string).notice: Removes `amount` of stake on the registered token from the item with `hash`.

setToken(address).notice: Sets the `token` address authorised to add and remove stake.
